service.sql: select max(time) from JYGK_SDDB_ORDER_EXECUTION_DETAILS where company_name in ${dwmcs}

select company_name , win_bid_year , win_bid_month , client_name , project_name , contract_no , execution_year , execution_month , actual_delivery_year , actual_delivery_month , model , voltage , capacity , number , code , tax_inclusive_price , not_tax_inclusive_price , bidding_transportation_fee , optimizing_transportation_cost , win_bid_cost , agency_fee , es_silicon_steel_grades , es_substitute_grade , es_quantity_of_silicon_steel , es_unit_price_of_silicon_steel , es_amount_of_silicon_steel , es_process_cost , es_total_amount_of_silicon_steel , es_copper_quantity , es_copper_price , es_copper_processing_fee , es_split_cover , es_copper_amount , es_transformer_oil_specification , es_transformer_oil_quantity , es_unit_price_of_transformer_oil , es_transformer_oil_amount , es_quantity_of_steel , es_steel_price , es_amount_of_steel , es_cardboard_quantity , es_cardboard_unit_price , es_amount_of_cardboard , es_casing_quantity , es_casing_unit_price , es_casing_amount , es_number_of_switches , es_switch_unit_price , es_switch_amount , es_number_of_cooler , es_cooler_unit_price , es_amount_of_cooler , es_online_monitoring_quantity , es_online_monitoring_unit_price , es_online_monitoring_amount , es_other_material_costs , es_total_amount_of_material , es_spare_parts , es_material_cost , es_labor_wages , es_manufacturing_cost , es_total_product_cost , es_gross_profit_amount , es_gross_margin , op_silicon_steel_grades , op_substitute_grade , op_quantity_of_silicon_steel , op_unit_price_of_silicon_steel , op_amount_of_silicon_steel , op_processing_cost_of_silicon_steel , op_copper_consumption , op_copper_price , op_amount_of_copper , op_copper_processing_fee , op_transformer_oil_specification , op_transformer_oil_consumption , op_unit_price_of_transformer_oil , op_transformer_oil_amount , op_steel_dosage , op_steel_price , op_amount_of_steel , op_cardboard_consumption , op_cardboard_unit_price , op_amount_of_cardboard , op_casing_quantity , op_casing_unit_price , op_casing_subtotal , op_number_of_switches , op_switch_unit_price , op_switch_subtotal , op_number_of_cooler , op_cooler_unit_price , op_cooler_subtotal , op_online_monitoring_quantity , op_online_monitoring_unit_price , op_online_monitoring_subtotal , op_other_materials , op_cost_of_tax_bearing_materials , op_spare_parts , op_total_tax_material , op_labor_cost , op_production_costs , op_gross_profit_amount , op_optimized_gross_margin , review_status from JYGK_SDDB_ORDER_EXECUTION_DETAILS where company_name in ${dwmcs} and time = ${maxTime[0]}
